SEARCH
Package fr.esiee.babaisyou.model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
fr.esiee.babaisyou.model.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
Represents the game board for the game "Baba Is You". The game board contains rows and columns of squares, each of which can hold various objects, properties, names, and operators.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameBoard(Path path)
    Constructs a GameBoard by loading it from a file.

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(Path path) throws IOException
      Constructs a GameBoard by loading it from a file.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file containing the game board configuration.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      NullPointerException - if the path is null.
